highlights: Kept Hora-claw in strict --yolo mode while adding compatibility fallback when --output-format json is unsupported.
Filtered noisy CLI banner lines (including YOLO mode notices) from user-facing error messages so real failures are shown.
Simplified project Gemini settings to avoid strict tool-core compatibility breakage across CLI versions.
Preserved per-chat isolated sessions and versioned online/offline + startup release-note announcements.
